name: Time is Running Out
description:
Time is Running Out is a single-player 2D racing game where you race against...yourself!

Take advantage of power-ups that grant you speed boosts, weapons, and access to secret areas as you try to exploit every loophole in the level and get the fastest time. Try to stay ahead of your ghost as you traverse the obstacles.

Worked with a team of 5 to complete the game in 32 hours. I was in charge of the physics engine, level design, replay implementation, and power-up design and development.
